data.reason: Created fo-experience.tsx with FO03OnboardingData interface (name, familiarity, topics, situation, feelings, whatHelps) and OnboardingState extending it with step/batch/swipe state. Implemented updateState, goToStep, nextStep, prevStep handlers. Added placeholder renderStep with all 14 steps (0-13). Updated page.tsx to render FOExperience. Lint and build pass.
data.title: Create FO-03 onboarding state interface and fo-experience shell

data.note: 2026-01-23 08:11 - h6b complete: Created fo-experience.tsx with full state interface. Key exports: FO03OnboardingData (user input), OnboardingState (full state). State includes familiarity as union type with null, topics as string[], and situation/feelings/whatHelps as {text, chips} objects. Progress bar shows 12 segments. All steps have placeholder renders with Continue buttons. prevStep handler included but not used yet. Next tasks can import OnboardingState type and use updateState/goToStep/nextStep from parent.
data.title: FO-03: Onboarding Steps 0-4

data.reason: Created step-welcome.tsx with 3 step screens: Step 0 (welcome headline + description), Step 1 (name input with disabled button until filled), Step 2 (personalized greeting with Start CTA). Updated fo-experience.tsx to import and render StepWelcome for steps 0-2.
data.title: Create step-welcome component for Steps 0-2

data.note: 2026-01-23 08:14 - ziv complete: Created step-welcome.tsx with Steps 0-2. Key differences from FO-02: removed emojis (per guidelines), Step 0 has separate headline + description (vs combined in FO-02), Step 2 CTA is 'Start' instead of 'Continue'. Component follows same props pattern: currentStep, name, onNameChange, onContinue. fo-experience.tsx updated to import and render StepWelcome. Next tasks (8kg step-familiarity, k9v step-topics) should follow same pattern: create component, then update fo-experience.tsx switch statement.

data.title: Create step-familiarity component for Step 3 with confetti

data.note: 2026-01-23 08:21 - 8kg complete: Created step-familiarity.tsx with 3 button options (New/Some/Very familiar). Uses canvas-confetti for confetti animation on selection, Framer Motion AnimatePresence for transitions. Shows 'Super, {name}\!' message and auto-advances after 1.5s. Added canvas-confetti and @types/canvas-confetti to package.json (run npm install). Next task k9v should follow same pattern.
data.title: FO-03: Onboarding Steps 0-4

data.reason: Created step-topics.tsx with 36 toggleable topic chips, confetti on Continue, 'Great choices\!' success message with 1.5s auto-advance, and 'Not sure' skip option. Updated fo-experience.tsx to import and render StepTopics at step 4.
data.title: Create step-topics component for Step 4 with multi-select chips

data.note: 2026-01-23 08:23 - k9v complete: Created step-topics.tsx with all 36 topic chips from spec. Uses same pattern as step-familiarity: AnimatePresence for transitions, confetti on Continue, 'Great choices\!' success message, 1.5s auto-advance. Has two CTAs: 'Continue' (disabled until selection, triggers confetti flow) and 'Not sure' (calls onSkip to advance without confetti). Props: currentStep, name, topics, onTopicsChange, onContinue, onSkip. Chip toggle uses same toggleTopic pattern from FO-02 step-intent. fo-experience.tsx updated to import and render StepTopics at case 4.

data.reason: Created reusable TextWithChips component at app/fo-03/components/text-with-chips.tsx. Component features: textarea for free text, toggleable chips with expand/collapse via More button, stores both text and selected chips in value object, disabled Continue when no input, uses framer-motion for chip animations, follows existing styling patterns.
data.title: Create reusable TextWithChips component

data.note: 2026-01-23 08:27 - TextWithChips component created at app/fo-03/components/text-with-chips.tsx. Props: headline, placeholder, primaryChips, moreChips, value ({text, chips}), onChange, onNotSure, onContinue. Uses AnimatePresence with mode='popLayout' for smooth chip expansion. Continue button disabled when no input (text or chips). Next tasks should wire this into fo-experience.tsx for steps 5-7 with step-specific chip data from the spec.
data.title: FO-03: Onboarding Steps 5-7 with Open Text + Chips

data.reason: Created HeartAnimation component with Framer Motion. Features: pulsing heart SVG icon, fade-in message, auto-advance after 2.5s, click to advance. Props: message string, onComplete callback.
data.title: Create heart animation component

data.note: 2026-01-23 08:28 - HeartAnimation component created at app/fo-03/components/heart-animation.tsx. Props: message (string), onComplete (callback). Features: pulsing heart SVG, fade-in message text, auto-advance after 2.5s or on click. Used between Steps 5->6 and 6->7. Messages per spec: Step 5 uses 'You are doing great - the more you write the better affirmations\!', Step 6 uses 'You have been doing great, {name}\! We are creating your personalized affirmations.' Next task should wire HeartAnimation into fo-experience.tsx for the step transitions.
data.title: FO-03: Onboarding Steps 5-7 with Open Text + Chips

data.reason: Wired up Steps 5-7 in fo-experience.tsx using TextWithChips and HeartAnimation components. Added showHeartAnimation state to manage transition animations between steps. Step 5 (situation) and Step 6 (feelings) show heart animation on Continue before advancing. Step 7 (whatHelps) advances directly. Added chip data constants for all three steps per spec. 'Not sure' skips the step without heart animation.
data.title: Implement Steps 5-7 using TextWithChips and HeartAnimation

data.note: 2026-01-23 08:32 - Steps 5-7 now fully wired in fo-experience.tsx. Key implementation detail: showHeartAnimation boolean state controls whether to show TextWithChips or HeartAnimation for steps 5 and 6. On Continue, showHeartAnimation is set to true; when heart animation completes, it resets to false and advances to next step. Step 7 has no heart animation. 'Not sure' skips directly without heart animation. All chip data constants are defined at module level.
data.title: FO-03: Onboarding Steps 5-7 with Open Text + Chips

data.title: Add FO-03 KV store entries to seed.ts

data.note: 2026-01-23 08:38 - 6ji complete: Added 5 FO-03 KV store entries (_info, _model_name, _temperature, prompt_initial, prompt_with_feedback). Templates flatten the FO-03 data structure into separate variables (e.g., situation_text and situation_chips instead of situation.text and situation.chips) to work with Liquid templating. The prompt_with_feedback includes approvedAffirmations, skippedAffirmations, and allPreviousAffirmations arrays for iterative learning.

data.title: Create FO-03 server actions

data.note: 2026-01-23 08:41 - 9rc complete: Created app/fo-03/actions.ts with generateAffirmationBatchFO03 server action. The parseAffirmationsResponse helper is duplicated from FO-02 to keep actions self-contained - consider extracting to shared utility if pattern repeats.

data.reason: FO-03 step-checkpoint.tsx already existed with correct implementation. Verified it matches spec: batch1 variant for Step 8 (after first 10), subsequent variant for Step 9 (after batches 2+), and transition variant for post-swipe. All headlines, copy, and CTAs match spec requirements.
data.title: Create FO-03 checkpoint component with multiple rounds

data.note: 2026-01-23 08:51 - Task j8r was already completed in commit 5046cdc. The step-checkpoint.tsx uses a 'variant' prop (batch1/subsequent/transition) instead of batchNumber for cleaner conditional rendering. All copy matches spec exactly. Component is ready for integration in fo-experience.tsx - the next task should wire it up in the swipe phase flow.
data.title: FO-03: Swipe Phase

data.reason: Integrated swipe phase and checkpoints into fo-experience.tsx. Added imports for SwipePhase, StepCheckpoint, and server action. Added hasSwipedOnce state tracking. Implemented generateBatch function calling generateAffirmationBatchFO03 with all onboarding context. Added swipe helper functions. Steps 8-9 now show: loading during generation, SwipePhase for swiping cards with persistent messaging, StepCheckpoint variants (batch1/subsequent/transition) after each batch. Users can swipe up to 3 batches or choose to stop early.
data.title: Integrate swipe phase and checkpoints into fo-experience

data.note: 2026-01-23 08:55 - Task aos completed: Integrated swipe phase and checkpoints into fo-experience.tsx. The flow is: Step 7 (whatHelps) triggers batch 1 generation -> Step 8 shows loading then swipe cards -> batch1 checkpoint after 10 swipes -> user can continue (batch 2) or finish -> subsequent checkpoint after batch 2 -> user can continue (batch 3) or finish -> transition screen after batch 3 or finish -> Step 10. hasSwipedOnce resets between batches for fresh intro messaging. currentBatchNumber=4 is used as signal for early-finish transition screen.
data.title: FO-03: Swipe Phase

data.title: Create FO-03 E2E test file

data.note: 2026-01-23 09:11 - Task l0b completed - created e2e/fo-03.test.ts. Test follows fo-02 pattern with helper functions (clickButton, waitForText, waitForTextContaining, swipeThroughBatch). Key differences: handles confetti auto-advance (2s sleeps after steps 3-4), heart animation waits (2.5s after steps 5-6), and uses chip selection instead of textarea input for most steps. Test selects 'I am good with the affirmations I chose' at checkpoint 1 to speed up test execution (only 1 batch). Run with: node --import tsx e2e/fo-03.test.ts
data.title: FO-03: E2E Testing

data.reason: Test already passing - ran twice with consistent success. Minor warning about 'Hopeful' chip is benign since it's in FEELINGS_MORE_CHIPS (requires clicking 'More+'), but 'Motivated' chip is successfully selected which enables Continue button.
